name: aedg_k12_exterior_door_construction

arguments.name: material_cost_insulation_increase_ip
arguments.display_name: Increase Cost per Area of Construction Where Insulation was Improved

modeler_description_xml:
Relevant construction types:
- Door - Swinging or NonSwinging 
- Overhead Door - Sliding 
- Overhead Door - RollUp
description_xml: This measure is intended for use on opaque doors; if doors are glass they should be treated as windows. OpenStudio does have a unique object for overhead doors versus standard doors. This measure doesn't alter infiltration. There is a separate measure for infiltration that includes user arguments for primary entry points.
